title: Best YouTube Vanced alternatives: NewPipe, SkyTube, LibreTube, & more!
content:
YouTube is a platform we all know and love. But it’s one that doesn’t necessarily provide you with all of the features you may want out of the box. Despite paying for a YouTube Premium subscription, many of us also used to use Vanced for the additional features that it offered. While advertisements are part-and-parcel

The post Best YouTube Vanced alternatives: NewPipe, SkyTube, LibreTube, & more! appeared first on xda-developers.
description: If you're looking to hop off of YouTube Vanced and try something new, we have a list of some of the best Vanced alternatives around.
